property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {MEGA LAST BURST} (When this creature leaves and is put into your hand, mana zone or graveyard, you may cast the spell side of this card for no cost.) TWINPACT ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. They can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS}: When you put this creature, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 8 or less and return them to their owner's hand. ■ This creature can't be blocked.
